languages.text: "Маражай, вы с Детьми Азуриана разве не одной крови? Почему они тебя так не любят?"

traits.locale_text: "Маражай, вы с Детьми Азуриана разве не одной крови? Почему они тебя так не любят?"

languages.text: "Marazhai, aren't you and the Children of Asuryan of the same blood? Why do they loathe you so?"
languages.original_text: "Маражай, вы с Детьми Азуриана разве не одной крови? Почему они тебя так не любят?"

traits.locale_text: "Marazhai, are you and the Children of Asuryan not of the same blood? Why do they loathe you so?"
"Marazhai, are you and the Children of Asuryan not of the same blood? Why do they loathe you so?"
"Marazhai, aren't you and the Children of Asuryan of the same blood? Why do they loathe you so?"
"Marazhai, aren't you and the Children of Asuryan of the same blood? Why do they loathe you so?"
"Marazhai, aren't you and the Children of Asuryan of the same blood? Why do they loathe you so?"
"Marazhai, aren't you and the Children of Asuryan of the same blood? Why do they loathe you so?"

languages.text: “玛拉斋，你和阿苏焉之子不是血脉相连的族人吗？他们为什么这么憎恨你？”
languages.original_text: "Marazhai, aren't you and the Children of Asuryan of the same blood? Why do they loathe you so?"

traits.locale_text: “玛拉斋，你和阿苏焉之子不是血脉相连的族人吗？他们为什么这么憎恨你？”

languages.text: 「マラズハイ、お前はアシュリアンの御子と同じ血筋ではないのか？何故彼らをそこまで憎む？」
languages.original_text: "Marazhai, aren't you and the Children of Asuryan of the same blood? Why do they loathe you so?"

traits.locale_text: 「マラズハイ、お前はアシュリアンの御子と同じ血筋ではないのか？何故彼らをそこまで憎む？」

languages.text: «Marazhai, ¿acaso los hijos de Asuryan y tú no sois de la misma sangre? ¿Por qué te odian tanto?».
languages.original_text: "Marazhai, aren't you and the Children of Asuryan of the same blood? Why do they loathe you so?"

traits.locale_text: «Marazhai, ¿acaso los hijos de Asuryan y tú no sois de la misma sangre? ¿Por qué te odian tanto?».

languages.text: "Marazhai, habt Ihr und die Kinder von Asuryan nicht dasselbe Blut? Warum hassen sie Euch derart?"
languages.original_text: "Marazhai, aren't you and the Children of Asuryan of the same blood? Why do they loathe you so?"

traits.locale_text: "Marazhai, haben Ihr und die Kinder von Asuryan nicht dasselbe Blut? Warum hassen sie Euch derart?"

languages.text: « Marazhai, n'êtes-vous pas du même sang que les enfants d'Asuryan ? Pourquoi vous détestent-ils autant ? »
languages.original_text: "Marazhai, aren't you and the Children of Asuryan of the same blood? Why do they loathe you so?"

traits.locale_text: « Marazhai, n'êtes-vous pas du même sang que les enfants d'Asuryan ? Pourquoi vous détestent-ils autant ? »

languages.text: "Marazhai... Sen Asuryan'ın Çocukları'yla kandaş değil misin? Neden seni sevmiyorlar?"
languages.original_text: "Marazhai, aren't you and the Children of Asuryan of the same blood? Why do they loathe you so?"

traits.locale_text: "Marazhai... Sen Asuryan'ın Çocukları'yla kandaş değil misin? Neden seni sevmiyorlar?"
